array.string: CREATE TABLE Identifier (rowid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, value NOT NULL, expiration NOT NULL, type NOT NULL, timestamp NOT NULL, generation, name, processId, amsDSID, paStatus)
CREATE TABLE IdentifierSource (rowid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, identifierRowId, source NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (identifierRowId) REFERENCES Identifier(rowid) ON DELETE CASCADE)
CREATE TABLE OdcaMessageQueue (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, position NOT NULL, type NOT NULL, assignedListener, payload)
CREATE TABLE OdcaAttribution (adamId, creationDate, start, end, candidate, tokenKey, tokens, expiration)
